website_summaries.verdict: The Sennheiser Urbanite XL Bluetooth headphones deliver a balanced sound signature, but the wireless control panel suffers from design flaws.
pros: Powerful, balanced audio performance with crisp highs and rich lows
Detachable cable with inline controls for wired, passive use
cons: Control panel on right earcup isn't laid out very well
Not for those seeking massive bass response

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones with astounding battery life.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones themselves are excellent - the battery life is extraordinarily good. I was aprehensive about Bluetooth headphones because I thought they’d be a pain and always need charging. I’ve been pleasantly surprised by these! The only issue I’ve had is that the ear pads sometimes fall off. They’re pretty fiddly to get back on and obviously if you’re on the move this gets very frustrating. Ear pads themselves are a good size and really are over ear. They’re soft memory foam pads which don’t deform over time. They feel very sturdy and durable. The folding mechanism isn’t flimsy like some - beats particularly. Just don’t get your skin trapped as you will cut yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Letty Jones

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones I've had
customer_reviews.text: I already own a wired pair which I've been very happy with for a few years, so when I saw the wireless ones going for a price I was prepared to pay I was straight in there. Very pleased I did. Excellent sound quality & the snug fit cuts out all exterior noise, so they are great for travelling. Pretty strong too.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Milne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The quality is so good compared to my last headphones I've been able to hear things in songs I couldn't before, for example it's made me hate 'cry me a river' by Justin timberlake because I can no hear someone in the background of the song making squelching noises to the beat. So I hate them for ruining a great song but maybe I should just blame JT
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Stupid design and foam covers fall off all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Although the sound quality is good, the design of these headphones is just stupid. The foam ear covers come off far too easily and frequently and then are fiddly to put back on. The touch controls to close calls, change volume are also really stupid - small target areas but easy to inadvertently hit them and drop a call. I wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Bates

customer_reviews.title: Heavy headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I found the weight of the headphones uncomfortable. with a tendency to flip over. Sound was good , overall good value
customer_reviews.author: Frank H.

customer_reviews.title: good cans
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a set of monster cans, these have good sound quality although I wouldn't fall for the marketing about the bass. Its good but not amazing. Blocks most of the London underground out as well..
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D Field

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones, the touch controls are a bit sensitive as when adjusting the headphones on your head you can change songs etc. The charging is good and lasts quite long. Only negative is the flimsy case that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and noise isolating. The adjustments on the side keep moving from time to time though.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable headphones with good quality sound. Good value for money, well happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best headphones ever, so expensive but so worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones good sound battery really fantastic but the problem ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones good sound battery really fantastic but the problem I have with this thing is that one of the cushions that's the left bit keeps falling off all the time. I have to be careful when getting it out of my bag. Nice headphones but bad hardware.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones. Used to own Beats solo 2. These are far better and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not as comfortable as I expected
customer_reviews.text: not as comfortable as I expected. Volume control works well but I prefer the sound from my LogitecUE9000 headphones which are heavier and more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: raymond

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: Both ear cups fell off after minimum usage. I ordered genuine earcups, definite difference in quality . Very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rees

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: When I use its line, the right do not have video. And I can not return it now.
customer_reviews.author: YijiaZhang

customer_reviews.title: problem
customer_reviews.text: the product that was sent to me were not wireless
customer_reviews.author: mark davies

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones about 2 months ago. Battery life is extraordinary, I use daily but have only charged 3 times. Great sound quality, superb build quality, I know some people have issues with pads falling off but I have not experienced this problem. Great bass and mids, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sam White

customer_reviews.title: On-Ear not Around-Ear
customer_reviews.text: Please note these headphones sit ‘on the ear’, and don’t fully enclose your ears, as do ‘around-ear’ models.
customer_reviews.author: D.B. McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Great value Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound quality. Very comfortable and light weight for fully enclosed headphones. Touch pad volume control works well, but tapping to select tracks and phone functions is difficult to operate consistently. Perhaps it will get easier with practice. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J B Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: These are in constant use in our house. The sound quality is brilliant. I use them for listening to music while doing jobs round the house and the other half nicks them in the evening for his PC gaming. They are comfortable to wear and easy to use. It took me a while to get used to the idea of the volume control on the headphone itself, but once I got the hang of it I was fine. It connected in to my Jawbone speakers and my Nexus tablet without a problem. Not the cheapest on the market but well worth the buy in my (our) opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Hamstead

customer_reviews.title: Too loud
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality, but just far too loud on the lowest volume setting using Bluetooth. No problems when using the wire which comes packaged, I wish I'd went for the cheaper (wired) of the two options now
customer_reviews.author: Sam

product_meta.title: Sennheiser URBANITE XL Wireless Headphone
product_meta.description:
The cool urban styling of Urbanite XL Wireless also comes with the durability and intelligence needed for a life on the streets. Built to last in every sense, they can deliver 25 hours of playback time, and are constructed with durable metal components, so they can keep pace with you day in and day out. The collapsible design makes it easy to fold and store in the supplied soft pouch.

BOX CONTAINS
URBANITE XL WIRELESS mobile stereo Bluetooth headphones
Detachable universal cable with in-line remote control and integrated microphone 
USB charging cable
Soft pouch
Quick Guide
Safety Guide
feature_bullets: Take your club with you - massive bass and clear treble.
Wireless Freedom - Bluetooth 4.0, NFC, voice prompts, 3-way-calling, multi-connectivity
Hours of use -25h of music without recharging, 15 days of stand-by time
Premium materials and mechanism - bold and contemporary design
Easy to store and bring along - the unique foldable design makes it easy to collapse and store in the supplied soft pouch
